definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Scarlet Overdrive!</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">particle minecraft:flame ^0 ^1 ^ 1 1 1 0.05 10 force @a</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">particle jojohe:large_hamon ^0 ^1 ^ 1 1 1 0.05 30 force @a</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="play_animation"><field name="active">&& !animation.isActive()</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="animation"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">scarletoverdrive</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:ScarletOverdriveE</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:scarletoverdrive</field><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
